law.catch_line: The Department may implement a food stamp program in accordance with the federal Food Stamp Act....

text.section: The Department may implement a food stamp program in accordance with the federal Food Stamp Act.
The State shall bear the nonfederal portion of the administrative costs of the food stamp program for each county.

Each local department shall administer the food stamp program:
under the supervision and control of the Department; and
in accordance with the regulations of the Department and federal law.
